entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain changing to wet snow mixed with rain and ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
